channel.title: MLOps Fraud Detection on Validated Patterns
channel.description: Recent content in MLOps Fraud Detection on Validated Patterns

item.title: Getting started
item.description: Deploying the MLOps Fraud Detection pattern Prerequisites An OpenShift cluster (Go to the OpenShift console). Cluster must have a dynamic StorageClass to provision PersistentVolumes.

item.title: Explore this pattern
item.description: Red Hat OpenShift AI components Most components installed as part of this pattern are available in the Red Hat OpenShift AI (RHOAI) console.

item.title: Fraud Detection on IBM Fusion
item.description: MLOPS credit card fraud detection on IBM Fusion This pattern is deployed with IBM Fusion. For more details, see the IBM Community Post.
